system.description: Students of the arcane arts, researchers and developers of spells as academic pursuit.

features.name: Spellcaster
features.description:
You can Cast Spells using Arcana.

Spells: You learn 4 Spells. You learn 1 other Spell every 2 Wizard Levels hereafter.

Mana: Your Maximum Mana is equal to (4 Ã— your Wizard Level), and the highest amount of Mana you can spend to Cast a Spell is equal to (Reason + half your Wizard Level, round up). You regain spent Mana when you Rest or Study.

features.name: Page Master
features.description: You gain the Bookworm Perk. Additionally, when you successfully Cast a Spell, you can spend one of your Studied dice and add it to the damage or healing roll.

features.name: Sculpt Spell
features.description: You pay 1 less Mana for Spell delivery.

features.name: Manifold Mind
features.description: You can Focus on up to two Spells at the same time.

features.name: Extracurricular
features.description: When you Cast, you can spend a Studied die to cast any one Spell with that Casting, even if it isn't a Spell you know.

features.name: Manifold Mind II
features.description: You can now Focus on up to three Spells at the same time.

features.name: Archwizard
features.description: You pay 2 less Mana for Spell delivery.
